content:
{"name": "Laurel Advocacy Referral Services (LARS)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The LARS Food Pantry is available for Laurel residents in the following zip codes: 20707, 20708, 20723, and 20724. 

Laurel residents seeking food can schedule an appointment or visit LARS during our walk-in hours.

**Walk-In Hours (FOOD ONLY):**
* Tuesday/Wednesday/Thursday from 9am-2pm, please arrive before 1:30 PM.
* Are available based on capacity and staff availability
* Walk-in appointments will be seen in order of arrival and may be required to wait
* Eligible to receive 1x/ month
* Please bring 1 reusable grocery bag for each person in your houseold, plus 1 extra.

**Scheduled Appointments:**
* Available on Monday/Wednesday/Friday from 9am-2pm and Monday from 5pm-7:30pm
* Can be scheduled over the phone by calling 301-776-0442 or vising the website www.lars.as.me
* Eligible to receive food 1x/ month
* Please bring 1 reusable grocery bag for each person in your houseold, plus 1 extra.

**First time visiting LARS? Please be sure to bring the following documents:**
* Valid photo ID for all adult household members (+18)
* Birth certificate, birth record or passport for all children (0-17)
* Proof of Laurel address in your name. Must reside in the following zip codes (20707, 20708, 20723, 20724)  

*Please call 301-776-0442 to schedule appointments for the following services: Clothing Voucher, SNAP Applications or Renewal’s, Obtaining an ID/SS Card and Mail Sign-Up’s* ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.laureladvocacy.org/foodpantry.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "311 Laurel Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Laurel", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20707", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.1017955, "longitude": -76.8477565}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 776-0442", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
